trans-unit.source: E-mail address is already in use
trans-unit.target: Mae cyfeiriad e-bost eisoes yn cael ei ddefnyddio

trans-unit.source: You don’t have permissions to view this content
trans-unit.target: Nid oes gennych ganiatâd i weld y cynnwys hwn

trans-unit.source: You have too many thumbnails, try deleting some before uploading new ones
trans-unit.target: Mae gennych ormod o fawd, ceisiwch ddileu rhai cyn uwchlwytho rhai newydd

trans-unit.source: Cannot set performance publicity period outside one of the tickets selling period
trans-unit.target: Ni all osod cyfnod cyhoeddusrwydd perfformiad y tu allan i un o'r cyfnod gwerthu tocynnau

trans-unit.source: You are already following this host
trans-unit.target: Rydych chi eisoes yn dilyn y gwesteiwr hwn

trans-unit.source: The provided rate value is invalid
trans-unit.target: Mae'r gwerth cyfradd a ddarperir yn annilys
Methu dod o hyd i'r sgôr bresennol

trans-unit.source: Requires Stripe to be connected to perform this action
trans-unit.target: Yn ei gwneud yn ofynnol i Stripe gael ei gysylltu i gyflawni'r weithred hon

trans-unit.source: Received response does not match submitter!
trans-unit.target: Nid yw'r ymateb a dderbynnir yn cyfateb i'r cyflwynydd!
Methu dod o hyd i unrhyw anfonebau

trans-unit.source: Cannot refund while another refund is already outstanding
trans-unit.target: Ni ellir ad-dalu tra bo ad-daliad arall eisoes heb ei dalu

source.p: This is a notification to confirm that {host_name} has initiated a refund on your order {invoice_id} for the amount of {invoice_amount} for the performance {performance_name}.
You can view the status of this refund at any time by logging in to your StageUp account and clicking settings -> payments.
We will automatically credit the funds to your {card_brand} ending in {last_4}. Please note, the amount may take up to 5 working days to appear in your account.

target.p: Mae hwn yn hysbysiad i gadarnhau bod {host_name} wedi cychwyn ad-daliad ar eich archeb {invoice_id} am y swm o {invoice_amount} ar gyfer y perfformiad {performance_name} .
Gallwch weld statws yr ad-daliad hwn ar unrhyw adeg trwy fewngofnodi i'ch cyfrif StageUp a chlicio gosodiadau -> taliadau.
Byddwn yn credydu'r arian yn awtomatig i'ch {card_brand} sy'n dod i ben yn {last_4} . Sylwch, gall y swm gymryd hyd at 5 diwrnod gwaith i ymddangos yn eich cyfrif.

trans-unit.target: Ad-daliad a gychwynnwyd gan {host_name} ar gyfer {performance_name}

source.p: You have initiated a refund for your performance “{performance_name}”
We have notified the affected customer that they shall receive the refunded amount in their account within 5 working days
Please note, if this request was not initated by you please notify us immediately

target.p: Rydych wedi cychwyn ad-daliad am eich perfformiad “{performance_name}”
Rydym wedi hysbysu'r cwsmer yr effeithir arno y bydd yn derbyn y swm a ad-dalwyd yn ei gyfrif cyn pen 5 diwrnod gwaith
Sylwch, os na chychwynnwyd y cais hwn gennych chi, rhowch wybod i ni ar unwaith

trans-unit.target: Cychwynnwyd ad-daliad ar gyfer pryniant {user_username} o {performance_name}

trans-unit.source: You have initiated refunds for {refund_quantity} invoice(s)
trans-unit.target: Rydych wedi cychwyn ad-daliadau ar gyfer anfoneb (ion) {refund_quantity}

source.p: You have initiated refunds for {refund_quantity} invoices
Total value: {invoices_total}
We have notified the affected customers that they shall receive the refunded amount in their accounts within 5 working days
Please note, if this request was not initated by you please notify us immediately"

target.p: Rydych wedi cychwyn ad-daliadau ar gyfer anfonebau {refund_quantity}
Cyfanswm gwerth: {invoices_total}
Rydym wedi hysbysu'r cwsmeriaid yr effeithir arnynt y byddant yn derbyn y swm a ad-dalwyd yn eu cyfrifon cyn pen 5 diwrnod gwaith
Sylwch, os na chychwynnwyd y cais hwn gennych chi, rhowch wybod i ni ar unwaith '

source.p: Hi {user_username},
This is a notification to confirm that {host_name} has successfully refunded your order {invoice_id} for {invoice_amount} for your purchase of {performance_name} due to:
The funds have now been credited to {card_brand} ending in {last_4}. You can view a log of this refund within your StageUp account settings

target.p: Helo {user_username},
Mae hwn yn hysbysiad i gadarnhau bod {host_name} wedi ad- dalu'ch archeb {invoice_id} yn llwyddiannus ar gyfer {invoice_amount} am eich pryniant o {performance_name} oherwydd:
Mae'r cronfeydd bellach wedi'u credydu i {card_brand} sy'n dod i ben yn {last_4} . Gallwch weld log o'r ad-daliad hwn yn eich gosodiadau cyfrif StageUp

source.p: Refund for {user_username} for {performance_name}(ID:{invoice_id}), succesfully processed by Stripe

target.p: Ad-daliad ar gyfer {user_username} ar gyfer {performance_name} (ID: {invoice_id}), wedi'i brosesu'n llwyddiannus gan Stripe

source.p: Hi {host_name},

This is a notification to confirm that your recent refund request for {user_username} for {performance_name} for the amount of {invoice_amount} has succesfully been refunded by Stripe and the user has been notified.
You can view the status of all your refunds within your account settings

target.p: Helo {host_name},

Mae hwn yn hysbysiad i gadarnhau bod eich cais am ad-daliad diweddar am {user_username} ar gyfer {performance_name} am y swm o {invoice_amount} wedi'i ad-dalu'n llwyddiannus gan Stripe a bod y defnyddiwr wedi'i hysbysu.
Gallwch weld statws eich holl ad-daliadau o fewn gosodiadau eich cyfrif

trans-unit.source: StageUp: Your refund request has been sent to @{host_name}
trans-unit.target: StageUp: Mae eich cais am ad-daliad wedi'i anfon at @{host_name}

source.p: Your refund request for the following invoice has been sent to {host_name}.
We’ll let you know when the host has processed your request

target.p: Mae eich cais am ad-daliad am yr anfoneb ganlynol wedi'i anfon at {host_name} .
Byddwn yn rhoi gwybod ichi pan fydd y gwesteiwr wedi prosesu'ch cais

trans-unit.source: StageUp: Refund request received for {performance_name} from @{user_username}
trans-unit.target: StageUp: Derbyniwyd cais am ad-daliad am {performance_name} gan @{user_username}

source.p: Hi {host_name},
@{user_username} ({user_email_address}) has requested a refund on their purchase of {performance_name}
To process this request you can visit your invoice dashboard here.

target.p: Helo {host_name},
Mae @{user_username} ({user_email_address}) wedi gofyn am ad-daliad ar eu pryniant o {performance_name}
I brosesu'r cais hwn gallwch ymweld â'ch dangosfwrdd anfoneb yma .

trans-unit.target: Gweler yr atodiadau am ddata anfoneb
Gweler yr atodiadau am ddata anfoneb

trans-unit.source: You have been invited to join {host_name} by {inviter_name}
trans-unit.target: Fe'ch gwahoddwyd i ymuno â {host_name} gan {inviter_name}

source.p: Hi {user_name},
Click the link to accept the invitation: {url}, this invite will expire in 24 hours.

target.p: Helo {user_name},
Cliciwch y ddolen i dderbyn y gwahoddiad: {url} , bydd y gwahoddiad hwn yn dod i ben mewn 24 awr .

trans-unit.source: You have been invited to watch a private performance
trans-unit.target: Fe'ch gwahoddwyd i wylio perfformiad preifat

source.p: Hi {user_name},
Click the link to watch {performance_name} by {host_name} on StageUp now: {url}>

target.p: Helo {user_name},
Cliciwch y ddolen i wylio {performance_name} gan {host_name} ar StageUp nawr: {url} >

trans-unit.source: Receipt of purchase of StageUp ticket

source.p: Hi {user_name},

target.p: Helo {user_name},
Fe wnaethoch chi brynu {ticket_name} i wylio {performance_name} ar gyfer {amount}. Cliciwch yma i wylio: {watch_url} Derbyn y pryniant hwn: {receipt_url}

source.p: Hi {user_name},
Thank you for supporting {host_name}!
Your patron payments of {amount} will be debited on {date_ordinal} of each month, starting today.
You can cancel your payments at any time. By making this payment you agree to StageUp’s Terms of Use
Thanks, StageUp Team

target.p: Helo {user_name},
Diolch am gefnogi {host_name} !
Bydd eich taliadau noddwr o {amount} yn cael eu debydu ar {date_ordinal} bob mis, gan ddechrau heddiw.
Gallwch ganslo'ch taliadau ar unrhyw adeg. Trwy wneud y taliad hwn rydych chi'n cytuno i Delerau Defnyddio StageUp
Diolch, Tîm StageUp

source.p: Hi {host_name},
@{user_username} is now a patron of your company.

target.p: Helo {host_name} ,
Mae @{user_username} bellach yn noddwr i'ch cwmni.

source.p: Hi {user_name},
You are receiving this because you (or someone else) has requested the reset of the password for your StageUp account.
Please click on the following link to complete the process. This link is valid for the next 24 hours.
If you did not request this change, please ignore this email and your password will remain unchanged.

target.p: Helo {user_name} ,
Rydych chi'n derbyn hwn oherwydd eich bod chi (neu rywun arall) wedi gofyn am ailosod y cyfrinair ar gyfer eich cyfrif StageUp.
Cliciwch ar y ddolen ganlynol i gwblhau'r broses. Mae'r ddolen hon yn ddilys am y 24 awr nesaf.
Os na ofynasoch am y newid hwn, anwybyddwch yr e-bost hwn a bydd eich cyfrinair yn aros yr un fath.

trans-unit.source: Your StageUp password was just changed
trans-unit.target: Newidiwyd eich cyfrinair StageUp yn unig

source.p: Your StageUp account password has recently been changed.
If you did not make this change, please login into your account and change your password as soon as possible.
If you have recently changed your password, then please ignore this

target.p: Newidiwyd cyfrinair eich cyfrif StageUp yn ddiweddar.
Os na wnaethoch y newid hwn, mewngofnodwch i'ch cyfrif a newid eich cyfrinair cyn gynted â phosibl.
Os ydych chi wedi newid eich cyfrinair yn ddiweddar, yna anwybyddwch hyn

source.p: Hi @{user_username},

@{host_username} has deleted/removed the {tier_name} tier. We have cancelled your current subscription ({sub_id}). It will come into effect immediately. You’ll recieve and e-mail shortly confirming the un-subscription.
Thanks, StageUp

target.p: Helo @{user_username} ,

Mae @{host_username} wedi dileu / dileu haen {tier_name}. Rydym wedi canslo'ch tanysgrifiad cyfredol ({sub_id}). Daw i rym ar unwaith. Byddwch yn derbyn ac yn e-bostio cyn bo hir yn cadarnhau'r tanysgrifiad.
Diolch, StageUp

source.p: Hi @{user_username},
This is a receipt of your un-subscription from @{host_username}'s patron tier, {tier_name}.
You’ll no longer be charged for this subscription & this subscription will be listed as ‘Cancelled’ on your account from now on.
Thanks, StageUp

target.p: Helo @{user_username},
Dyma dderbynneb o'ch tanysgrifiad gan haen noddwr @{host_username} , {tier_name} .
Ni chodir tâl arnoch am y tanysgrifiad hwn mwyach a bydd y tanysgrifiad hwn yn cael ei restru fel 'Canslo' ar eich cyfrif o hyn ymlaen.
Diolch, StageUp

trans-unit.target: Mae gwerth eisoes yn cael ei ddefnyddio

trans-unit.source: Must be logged in to perform this action
trans-unit.target: Rhaid mewngofnodi i gyflawni'r weithred hon

trans-unit.source: Must be a Site Admin to perform this action
trans-unit.target: Rhaid bod yn Weinyddwr Safle i gyflawni'r weithred hon

trans-unit.source: Missing a field in the provided data
trans-unit.target: Ar goll maes yn y data a ddarperir

trans-unit.source: Your account must be verified to perform this action
trans-unit.target: Rhaid gwirio'ch cyfrif i gyflawni'r weithred hon

trans-unit.source: Not a valid HMRC Company number
trans-unit.target: Ddim yn rhif Cwmni Cyllid a Thollau EM dilys
Ddim yn URL dilys ar Facebook
